category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA112_cadext_2_itemtype_map
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to specify the item type assigned by default to AutoCAD files being saved in Teamcenter for the first time. The preference can contain multiple string values, each one in the form: <file extension pattern>=<item type> where <file extension pattern> can be one of *.dwg, *.dwt or *.*. Example: *.*=Document => all the not explicitly declared AutoCAD files will be created as type Document *.dwt =MEResource => the *.dwt files will be created as items of type MEResource
